name: Dining Hall Ifetaya 07: Dark Days Coming

nodes.text: A storm is coming, Mister Shawn-Shawn. The Nights of the Dead, they are a dark sign that the future, it will be even darker. You best be watching yourself.
What's up?
More than you know, Shawn. More than I can tell.

options.text: Tell About Joel and the Wraith

nodes.text: I've found my missing classmate in the Catacombs, but he's guarded by a Wraith...
A Wraith, it is one of the worst of the bad Duppies. It can be defeated by combat, but it cannot be destroyed unless its ọkàn is destroyed as well.
This is not a Duppy to be spoken to, it brings only pain and death. Do not try to face the Wraith, my Shawn-Shawn. Speak with Lady Moira. She will know the way to deal with such a thing.
I hope that she can save your friend.
Why can't you just tell me what it is you want me to do?
I am not your Master, Mister Shawn-Shawn. I am not your boss. You do what you want to do.
All I can say is that your path is shadowed. Watch your steps.
So what's your take on all this, Riki?
Riki, she be just little critter. When bad things come, Riki, she be hiding. Riki, she is not Hero like Shawn.

options.text: Ask About the Nights of the Dead

nodes.text: What's going on with the Nights of the Dead? Isn't it just a few ghosts floating around for a few nights?
The Dead of this land, they rest uneasily. They don't forget the past. They don't forgive the past. Soon the gate between the worlds will open and the Dead will come through.
Now, most Duppies, they are not bad. They just got something they need to do or say. Once they do that, they can go back to the Grey Lands.
Some Duppies, though, they can be very bad. They envy the Living so much, they want the Living to die.
What's a Duppy?
The good Duppies, you would be calling them ghosts. You call the bad Duppies Wraiths. This castle, it is protected against the Wraiths. The Duppies you meet in the castle, they mean you no harm.
But when you are not in the castle, you'd best not let the bad Duppies get you. They suck out your life and pull you down into their grave.

options.text: Ask About Talking to the Dead

nodes.text: Can you talk to the dead?
Anyone can talk to Duppies, Mister Shawn-Shawn. It's the listening part that is hard. Unless you got Magic, Duppies just sound like the wind of a storm.
Is there some way I can get the Magic to talk to the dead?
Maybe so. Maybe not. Speaking with the Duppies, it is very dangerous. Duppies, even the good ones, they feed on the spirits of the living. That is why it feels so cold when the Duppies are around.
If you, Mr. Shawn-Shawn, most truly wish to speak with Duppies, then I can make you a charm that will let you hear what they Duppies say. However, first you must bring me three things.
These things, they are not easy to find. These things, they are dangerous to get. Speaking to Duppies, it will bring you closer to the Grey Lands. So this I will ask and you must answer.
Do you, Shawn O'Conner, wish to speak with the Dead?
Yes, I do.
Three things you must bring me to make a gris-gris for you. The first is the hair from a dead man's head. The second is a Death's Head mushroom. The third is the dust of a ghost.
Here - take this bottle. It is for you to catch the dust of a Duppy.
You have very little time to do this before the Nights of the Dead comes.
You have chosen an interesting path, Mister Shawn-Shawn.

nodes.name: Speaking to the Dead
nodes.description:
Okay, that was an interesting talk with the Chef. Somehow, I am going to speak with the dead. Why? That's a good question. Guess I'll find out.

According to Chef Kinah, I need to bring her three things so that I can speak with the dead - some dead man's hair, some Death's Head mushrooms, and the dust of the dead.

Not only that, but I have to do this quickly. What have I gotten myself into?

nodes.text: I guess not.
So does wanting to speak with spooks mean I am making a 'grave' error - or does it only ghost to show that I am Wight?
Answer the question, please.
Have you got some more work for me to do here?
Of course, there is always work for you here.
Return after supper and we will put you to work.
I'll see you both later.
Od'abo, Mister Shawn-Shawn.
Bye-bye for now.
